skill_constraints: Single backend developer is a critical bottleneck and single point of failure (RISK-008).
resource_bottlenecks: All backend and security tasks depend on one person.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive cross-training, mandatory pair programming on critical components.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new developer in the first sprint.
resource_bottlenecks: QA capacity might become a bottleneck with increased developer velocity.
mitigation_strategies: Add a mid-level backend contractor. Parallelize backend development tasks in Sprints 2 and 3.

skill_constraints: No dedicated QA resource. Backend developer must also handle frontend data layer.
mitigation_strategies: De-scope all 'Should Have' features (US-059, US-065). Reduce testing rigor.
